articles.author: Michael Sheetz
articles.title: Watch Maxine Waters and Treasury Secretary Mnuchin argue at hearing: 'I will not be back here'
articles.description: Rep. Maxine Waters, chairwoman of the House Financial Services Committee, and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin squabble over his schedule.
articles.content:
Rep. Maxine Waters, chairwoman of the House Financial Services Committee, and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin squabbled at a hearing, with Mnuchin going so far as to threaten to not testify before the committee again if he was not allowed to leave.

articles.author: Oren Liebermann and Andrew Carey, CNN
articles.title: Netanyahu on cusp of victory after tight Israeli election results
articles.description: Benjamin Netanyahu appeared to be on the cusp of securing a record fifth term as Israeli Prime Minister Wednesday after a dramatic finish to a closely fought election race.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Charges dropped against man accused of abandoning pet fish
articles.description: Charges have been dropped against a North Carolina man accused of leaving his pet fish behind without food when he was evicted.
articles.content:
WILMINGTON, N.C. Charges have been dropped against a North Carolina man accused of leaving his pet fish behind without food when he was evicted.

articles.title: Want border security? Drop the wall and welcome more immigrants
articles.description: Last month, the House failed to override President Trump's declaration of a national emergency at the border. This vote is just one flash point in an ongoing debate about immigration policy, and rightly so.

articles.title: 24 Charged in $1.2 Billion Medicare Scheme, U.S. Says
articles.description: The scheme, which involved the prescribing of unnecessary back, shoulder, wrist and knee braces, spanned multiple continents, according to the authorities.
articles.content: In Florida, Willie McNeal IV, the owner and chief executive of two telemedicine companies, hired health care providers and then paid them to prescribe braces for Medicare beneficiaries regardless of whether it was medically necessary, according to an indictme… [+1594 chars]

articles.title: Prosecutors Say Drugmaker Indivior Lied About Popular Opioid Treatment
articles.description: Indivior Plc plummeted to an all-time low after U.S. prosecutors said the U.K. drugmaker deceived doctors about its addiction treatment’s dangers, fueling a deadly epidemic of opioid abuse.

articles.author: Kelly Yamanouchi
articles.title: Delta CEO hopes 737 Max issue ‘doesn’t set us back as an industry’
articles.description: Delta Air Lines chief executive officer Ed Bastian said while his airline doesn't fly the Boeing 737 Max, which has been grounded in the wake of two crashes, he hopes it "doesn't set us back as an industry."
articles.content:
Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian said discussions surrounding probes into crashes of two Boeing 737 Max planes will “open up a lot of questions.”
